stable.title: Announcing ImageGlass 9.0.11.502
stable.description: Added support for saving image as AVIF format; Addressed numerous bugs and issues for a more stable and reliable experience.

kobe.title: Announcing ImageGlass 9.0.11.502
kobe.description:
Added support for saving image as AVIF format; Addressed numerous bugs and issues for a more stable and reliable experience.
⚠️ Note: Some version 8 features ARE NOT available, please read the blog post before upgrading.
